section.name: AstroGrid Workbench
section.p:
The Workbench is a desktop application that interacts with AstroGrid services. It provides
a suite of utility applications for working with myspace, cea, workflow, etc
a simple API for calling AstroGrid services from scripts and other programs
More information in the Wiki Overview and more user docs to come.

The Workbench can be launched by clicking the links below.
Launch Application (Stable Version)
Launch Application (Beta Version)
The workbench is launched using Java WebStart technology - if you experience problems, see the Web Start Userguide.
The following sections illustrate some of the utility applications provided by the Workbench.

subsection.name: MySpace Browser
subsection.p: The MySpace browser lets you see the contents of your MySpace store, copy, move & delete files, and upload or download data to your MySpace.

subsection.name: CEA Application Launcher
subsection.p: The Appliction launcher lets you browse a list of published remote applications and data sources, and then simply execute one by providing a few parameters.

subsection.name: Job Monitor
subsection.p: Lets you monitor the progress of running workflows and remote applications. New workflows can be submitted for execution, and the results of completed ones viewed and then deleted.
